Documented here are conference presentations I have given! I have excluded presentations associated with a specific publications. As I update this list, I will try to provide videos or slides, however given the sensitive nature of some of these discussions, I have also intentionally excluded some.

Presentations

Liberation Atlas: Mapping the Policing of Asian Massage Work
Amy Wei Xiao*, Arman Deeder*, Shravya Sompalli*, and Elena Shih.
Beyond the Interface: Critical Perspectives of Sex Work and Sextech, 2024. (Presentation)
The Trafficking-Deportation Pipeline: Policing Asian Massage Bodywork and the War on Trafficking
Amy Wei Xiao*, Arman Deeder*, Shravya Sompalli*, and Elena Shih.
Association for Asian American Studies Conference, 2024. (Presentation)
Sex Machina: In/Visible Queer Entanglements and Human-AI* Cybersexual Intimacies
Amy Wei Xiao*, Kaitlyn Mundy*, and M.H. Chau*.
The Society for the Study of Affect Conference: Promises, Impasses, Threats, Settlings, 2024. (Presentation)
